resources.string: Touch screen to begin the tour to Salamina
Ancient town of Salamina was on southern place of salamina.You can see the remains of that city.
In Salamina\'s famous battleship place you can see the harboor where battleship took place.
Euripide\'s cave is at Peristeria and was found by archaiologist Gianni Lolo(1994 to 1997).It is the place where Euripides wrote
St Nikolas Monastery is near kanakia beach and is in the forest
At the Folklore museum of Salamina you can see how people in Salamina where dressed, tools they used etc in the last century.
Perani Beach Bar is an organized beach where you can swim and drink yoyr coffee.
Kolones is a very beautiful clean rocky beach
Kanakia is a very nice beach near ancient Salamina at the south.
